content.question: Dr. Gunther wants to find out if he can cause phobias in children by exposing them to loud noises. He walks down the hall to a preschool classroom and suddenly starts blaring sounds of thunder and watches to see which children seem scared. Which of the following ethical procedures does Dr. Gunther fail to obtain?

topic.text: 5.4: Selection of Categories of Psychological Disorders

skill.text: 2.D: Evaluate whether a psychological research scenario followed appropriate ethical procedures.
